creator: weawow weather app
descriptionHtml:
Weawow is a beautiful and highly accurate weather forecast application.
You can also sell your photos at the Weawow marketplace.



Accurate and detailed weather forecast for free
- Free without advertisement: No annoying advertisements are displayed at all.
- Beautiful photos and weather forecast: The beautiful photos posted by users are matched with the weather forecast and displayed, so you can see the weather conditions from the photographs.
- Corresponding weather forecast: live weather, today weather, tomorrow weather, 48 hour weather, weekly weather.
- Accurate and detailed weather: highest temperature, lowest temperature, live temperature, apparent (feels-like) temperature, probability of rain, precipitation, humidity, dew point, clouds cover, atmospheric pressure, wind speed, wind direction, UV index, visibility, air Quality, pollen.
- Covers worldwide: Countries, cities, spots, places, and local that can be searched using Google search.
- Supported languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Chinese, and 50 more languages.
- Animated radar map: rainy situation, temperature, cloud movement, wind movement, atmospheric pressure. All of these information can be seen up to 14 days ahead.
- Sun and Moon: Sunrise time, sunset time, twilight, moon phases, full moon day, new moon day, age of the moon.
- Bookmark: Manage your favorite places with bookmarks.
- Simple interface: You can get the necessary information by simply scrolling down the screen.
- Choose your favorite theme: Dark theme and white theme are available.



Beautiful widget
- Weather forecast widget with pictures: Enjoy a richer home screen with beautiful pictures and weather forecast.
- Around 10 types of widget: Sizes range from 1x1 to 4x4. Changeable font size, background transparency, color, place, local time.
- Real time update: Automatically get the latest weather forecast.
- GPS support: Even if you move to another local, you will automatically get the weather information for that local.
- Clock, date: Supports local time. Launches calendar application and clock application.



Daily notification and On-going notification
- Push notification: Notifies the weather forecast for that day at the specified time.
- On-going notification: weather information up to 8 hours ahead, weekly weather, current weather.
- Weather on the status bar: Current temperature, today's highest temperature, today's lowest temperature, weather type.



Covers worldwide, in all cities
- Examples of supported countries: United Kingdom (UK), Ireland, United State (US), Spain, France, Germany, Russia, Turkey, India, China, Japan, Argentina, Brazil, and all other countries.
- Examples of supported cities: London, Birmingham, Leeds, Glasgow, Sheffield, Bradford, Manchester, Edinburgh, Liverpool, Bristol, Cardiff, Washington, D.C, Chicago, New York, Madrid, Stockholm, Rome, Berlin, Athens, Prague, Warsaw, Kyiv, Moscow, Ankara, New Delhi, Tokyo, Buenos Aires, and all other cities and local.



Posting and selling your photos
- You can post and sell your photos from Weawow's browser service.
- The posted photos are automatically displayed after being matched with the weather in the application as well.
https://weawow.com/marketplace



Weather Providers: NOAA, MET Norway, Goverment of Canada, Dark Sky, Weatherbit, World Weather Online, Weatherbit, AccuWeather, WAQI, RainViewer.
descriptionShort: Free, and there is no advertisement at all.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for waiting. Added a 3D earth radar that allows you to see NOAA's weather forecast for the next two weeks.
Fixed some layout issues.
The stability of the app has been improved.

descriptionShort: Free, and there is no advertisement at all.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improved the way the photos are displayed.
Added support for devices with a notch.
Added the UV index and dew point to the current weather of "MET Norway"'s weather provider.
You can launch the clock app from a widget when on a Samsung device.
Minor fixes to widgets and main screen layout.
Fixed a problem with the white and polar nights.

descriptionShort: Free, and there is no advertisement at all.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added the optional feature to the widgets (and notification) of the hourly and weekly type that you can change the weather type like wind or dew point, besides temperature.
Added a $2 donation.
Added support for Android OS 11 Beta notifications.
Improved battery usage.
You can select the clock app from a widget when on a Samsung device.
In the case of "Weatherbit" and Russian language, changed the pressure values to ground level.

Accurate and detailed weather forecast for free
- Free without advertisement: No annoying advertisements are displayed at all.
- Beautiful photos and weather forecast: The beautiful photos posted by users are matched with the weather forecast and displayed, so you can see the weather conditions from the photographs.
- Corresponding weather forecast: live weather, today weather, tomorrow weather, 48 hour weather, weekly weather.
- Accurate and detailed weather: highest temperature, lowest temperature, live temperature, apparent (feels-like) temperature, probability of rain, precipitation, humidity, dew point, clouds cover, atmospheric pressure, wind speed, wind direction, UV index, visibility, air Quality, pollen.
- Covers worldwide: Countries, cities, spots, places, and local that can be searched using Google search.
- Supported languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Chinese, and 50 more languages.
- Animated radar map: rainy situation, temperature, cloud movement, wind movement, atmospheric pressure. All of these information can be seen up to 14 days ahead.
- Sun and Moon: Sunrise time, sunset time, twilight, moon phases, full moon day, new moon day, age of the moon.
- Bookmark: Manage your favorite places with bookmarks.
- Simple interface: You can get the necessary information by simply scrolling down the screen.
- Choose your favorite theme: Dark theme and white theme are available.
- Severe Weather Alerts.



Beautiful widget
- Weather forecast widget with pictures: Enjoy a richer home screen with beautiful pictures and weather forecast.
- Around 10 types of widget: Sizes range from 1x1 to 4x4. Changeable font size, background transparency, color, place, local time.
- Real time update: Automatically get the latest weather forecast.
- GPS support: Even if you move to another local, you will automatically get the weather information for that local.
- Clock, date: Supports local time. Launches calendar application and clock application.



Daily notification and On-going notification
- Push notification: Notifies the weather forecast for that day at the specified time.
- On-going notification: weather information up to 8 hours ahead, weekly weather, current weather.
- Weather on the status bar: Current temperature, today's highest temperature, today's lowest temperature, weather type.



Covers worldwide, in all cities
- Examples of supported countries: United Kingdom (UK), Ireland, United State (US), Spain, France, Germany, Russia, Turkey, India, China, Japan, Argentina, Brazil, and all other countries.
- Examples of supported cities: London, Birmingham, Leeds, Glasgow, Sheffield, Bradford, Manchester, Edinburgh, Liverpool, Bristol, Cardiff, Washington, D.C, Chicago, New York, Madrid, Stockholm, Rome, Berlin, Athens, Prague, Warsaw, Kyiv, Moscow, Ankara, New Delhi, Tokyo, Buenos Aires, and all other cities and local.



Posting and selling your photos
- You can post and sell your photos from Weawow's browser service.
- The posted photos are automatically displayed after being matched with the weather in the application as well.
Weawow Marketplace
descriptionShort: Free, and there is no advertisement at all.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Merry Christmas!! These are gifts from Weawow.
Added new weather providers of NWS, DWD, and AerisWeather. I will continue to add other local weather providers.
Added the comparing weather provider screen by hourly charts.
Added new weather icon. You can change to it from setting screen.
Added the Tornado alert icon for USA. I apologize for the delay in getting this to you.

title: Weather & Widget - Weawow

creator: weawow weather app
descriptionHtml:
Weawow is a free (and ad-free) weather app enhanced by beautiful weather-related photos taken by photographers around the world.
The photos reflect the current weather at your location, showing you whether it’s fair, cloudy, rainy, snowy, so you can decide whether you’ll need your umbrella or your sunglasses when you go out.
When you open the Weawow app, you’re likely to encounter unexpected "Wow" photos, rather than a boring, text-based forecast. And that’s not all: if you take "Wow" photos yourself, you can post your "Wow" photos from our Website. Then, we can integrate them into the app, where they’ll be seen by weather watchers all over the world (the app is available in over 50 languages).
The app’s layout is customizable, allowing you to select what to display like rain, wind gust, pressure, UV index, etc.
The Weawow is sustained by user donations. If you like the Weawow and want to support the Weawow project, please donate to us.
Of course, this is not mandatory, so please feel free to use the app.

WEATHER DATA
- Changeable weather providers: NWS (NOAA), DWD, MET Norway, Dark Sky, AerisWeather, Weatherbit, World Weather Online, Open Weather map, (AccuWeather, Foreca).
- Free without advertisement: No annoying advertisements are displayed at all.
- Detailed weather: Temperature, Feels-like temperature, Rain, Humidity, Dew point, Clouds, Pressure, Wind, Wind gust, UV index, visibility, Snow depth. Temp., Rain, Wind, Wind gust, Pressure, Dew point, Humidity, Cloud cover, UV index, Visibility, Snowfall.
- Supported languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Chinese, and 50 more languages.
- Sun and Moon: Sunrise time, sunset time, twilight, moon phases, full moon day, new moon day, age of the moon.
- Air Quality (WAQI), Severe Weather Alerts, Pollen (only AccuWeather and USA).

SIMPLE INTERFACE
- Bookmark: Manage your favorite places with bookmarks. You can change them by swiping left / right.
- Simple interface: You can get the necessary information by simply scrolling down the screen.

WEATHER MAP, RADAR
- Weather Providers: NOAA, RainViewer, MET Norway, MSC.
- Globe (14 days forecast): You can check the wind animation and various weather layers with the 3D earth.
- Google Maps (Radar & 1 day forecast): You can check the real rainfall radar with the Google Maps.

CUSTOMIZABLE LAYOUT
- As you like: You can freely change the layout to display daily weather, hourly weather, radar, etc.
- Sort order: You can change the priority of weather type like Temperature, Rain, Wind, Wind gust, Pressure, UV index.
- Weather Icon: You can change it from various weather icons.
- Choose your favorite theme: Dark theme and white theme are available.

CUSTOMIZABLE WIDGETS
- As you like: You can always check the weather you care about, such as the hourly UV index on your home screen.
- Widget themes: Simple, Clock, Hourly Graph, Daily Graph, Currently, Today, Hourly, Daily.

NOTIFICATIONS
- Push notification: Notifies the weather forecast for that day at the specified time.
- On-going notification: weather information up to 8 hours ahead, weekly weather, current weather.

DONATE
- If you donate to us, you can use AccuWeather / Foreca.

MARKETPLACE
- You can post and sell your photos from Weawow's browser service.
- The posted photos are automatically displayed after being matched with the weather in the application as well.
https://weawow.com/marketplace
descriptionShort: Beautiful, and there is no advertisement at all.

The photos reflect the current weather at your location, showing you whether it’s fair, cloudy, rainy, snowy, so you can decide whether you’ll need your umbrella or your sunglasses when you go out.
When you open the Weawow app, you’re likely to encounter unexpected "Wow" photos, rather than a boring, text-based forecast. The Weawow is sustained by user donations. If you like the Weawow and want to support the Weawow project, please donate to us.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added new local weather providers: Meteo France, AEMET
Added solar radiation. Available weather providers: Weatherbit, AerisWeather, AccuWeather, Foreca
Added daily and overview comparisons in the weather provider comparison screen.
Fixed an issue that could cause On-going Notification to be hidden when a photo is displayed in the 24 hours Weather.

title: Weather & Widget - Weawow

creator: weawow weather app
descriptionHtml:
Weawow is a free (and ad-free) weather app enhanced by beautiful weather-related photos taken by photographers around the world.
The photos reflect the current weather at your location, showing you whether it’s fair, cloudy, rainy, snowy, so you can decide whether you’ll need your umbrella or your sunglasses when you go out.
When you open the Weawow app, you’re likely to encounter unexpected "Wow" photos, rather than a boring, text-based forecast. And that’s not all: if you take "Wow" photos yourself, you can post your "Wow" photos from our Website. Then, we can integrate them into the app, where they’ll be seen by weather watchers all over the world (the app is available in over 50 languages).
The app’s layout is customizable, allowing you to select what to display like rain, wind gust, pressure, UV index, etc.
The Weawow is sustained by user donations. If you like the Weawow and want to support the Weawow project, please donate to us.
Of course, this is not mandatory, so please feel free to use the app.

WEATHER DATA
- Changeable weather providers: NWS (NOAA), DWD, MET Norway, Dark Sky, AerisWeather, Weatherbit, World Weather Online, Open Weather map, (AccuWeather, Foreca).
- Free without advertisement: No annoying advertisements are displayed at all.
- Detailed weather: Temperature, Feels-like temperature, Rain, Humidity, Dew point, Clouds, Pressure, Wind, Wind gust, UV index, visibility, Snow depth. Temp., Rain, Wind, Wind gust, Pressure, Dew point, Humidity, Cloud cover, UV index, Visibility, Snowfall.
- Supported languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Chinese, and 50 more languages.
- Sun and Moon: Sunrise time, sunset time, twilight, moon phases, full moon day, new moon day, age of the moon.
- Air Quality (WAQI), Severe Weather Alerts, Pollen (only AccuWeather and USA).

SIMPLE INTERFACE
- Bookmark: Manage your favorite places with bookmarks. You can change them by swiping left / right.
- Simple interface: You can get the necessary information by simply scrolling down the screen.

WEATHER MAP, RADAR
- Weather Providers: NOAA, RainViewer, MET Norway, MSC.
- Globe (14 days forecast): You can check the wind animation and various weather layers with the 3D earth.
- Google Maps (Radar & 1 day forecast): You can check the real rainfall radar with the Google Maps.

CUSTOMIZABLE LAYOUT
- As you like: You can freely change the layout to display daily weather, hourly weather, radar, etc.
- Sort order: You can change the priority of weather type like Temperature, Rain, Wind, Wind gust, Pressure, UV index.
- Weather Icon: You can change it from various weather icons.
- Choose your favorite theme: Dark theme and white theme are available.

CUSTOMIZABLE WIDGETS
- As you like: You can always check the weather you care about, such as the hourly UV index on your home screen.
- Widget themes: Simple, Clock, Hourly Graph, Daily Graph, Currently, Today, Hourly, Daily.

NOTIFICATIONS
- Push notification: Notifies the weather forecast for that day at the specified time.
- On-going notification: weather information up to 8 hours ahead, weekly weather, current weather.

MARKETPLACE
- You can post and sell your photos from Weawow's browser service.
- The posted photos are automatically displayed after being matched with the weather in the application as well.
https://weawow.com/marketplace
descriptionShort: Beautiful, and there is no advertisement at all.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Fixed an issue that sometimes prevented donations from being automatically restored when reinstalling the app.
(Android 9 and above) When Auto is selected as the theme of the app, it now refers to the theme of the device.
(Android 12, 13) Optimized the layout of the On-going Notification which became smaller due to the specification change of Google's notification panel.
(Android 12, 13) Added support for approximate location in the Current Location function.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Changed the weather provider of Dark Sky to Apple Weather. This is because Apple acquired Dark Sky and Dark Sky will end at the end of March 2023. We think the weather forecast of Apple is an improvement over Dark Sky.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Supported Android 14 Beta.
(Android 12 and above) Added Alarm Permission to run the Widgets or Notifications in the background regularly. If you want to use them, please allow the Alarm Permission. In the Android 14, default Alarm Permission will be turned off.
Removed the limit of a maximum of 4 photo widgets.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Supported Android 14 Beta.
(Android 12 and above) Added Alarm Permission to run the Widgets or Notifications in the background regularly. If you want to use them, please allow the Alarm Permission. In the Android 14, default Alarm Permission will be turned off.
Removed the limit of a maximum of 4 photo widgets.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added option to turn off in-app photos. (Custom Layout > Overview)
Added option to display both Celsius and Fahrenheit in the app. (Overview and Detailed daily screen)
Added option to turn off Severe Weather Alerts.
Text on Severe Weather Alerts screen can now be selected and copied.
Improved the layout of some widgets.
Fixed the unit for daily solar radiation.
Stabilized behavior when pressing the back button on the device.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added the detailed sun and moon screen with timeline, including golden hour etc. Try to tap the sun and moon section.
Improved the hourly charts on the widgets using a group like wind and wind gust.
Stopped sharing your current location feature that supports the Weawow project. The support feature in the app is only donation.
Added the today's weather icon on the overview section.
Fixed some issues.

Improved GPS address names.

Added the selectable app icons of the home screen on the settings screen. I plan to add new app icons according to the season.
Added Snowfall chart to the Precipitation section, when snowfall is available for the weather provider.
Added some descriptions on the detailed sun and mooon screen.
Changed the detailed icon to the arrow icon on the main screen.
Fixed several minor issues.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Android 12 and above: Widgets and notifications now run even without granting the Alarm permission. However, please note that they may not run at the exact scheduled time without it.
Improved the radar view on Google Maps to display more place names.
Improved popup messages to make them clearer.
Improved the switch buttons to be easier to tap.
